subject: Baseball
Officiating (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Two researchers found that major league umpires made more errors in favor of All-Star pitchers than in favor of pitchers who were never All-Stars — about 17 percent more.
snippet: Two researchers found that major league umpires made more errors in favor of All-Star pitchers than in favor of pitchers who were never All-Stars — about 17 percent more.
